entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Stephen 5:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: NE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
